keys: le poteau tiennent le premier rôle

          <title>
            <string language="en">The pole star</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Pfostenstern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le poteau tiennent le premier rôle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrela do pólo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La stella del palo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αστέρι πόλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estrella del poste</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that the Pole star is located right above the North Pole.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Directions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß der Pole Stern nach 
rechts über dem Nordpol sich befindet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que le Polonais 
tiennent le premier rôle est situé bien au-dessus du Polonais du nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que a estrela de Pólo está
ficada situada para a direita acima do pólo norte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che la stella del Palo è 
situata a destra sopra il palo del nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι το αστέρι Πολωνού 
βρίσκεται δεξιά επάνω από το βόρειο πόλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que la estrella de poste 
está situada a la derecha sobre el Polo Norte.</string>
          </description>
